name: Astronomical Profits
description:
If you experience sound glitches try changing your browser!

STORY:

Astronaut 64 is the chosen protector of the Supremum-17 colony, which has been plagued with asteroids raining down. They have forged a deal with the great Zzkrezzt to trade the planet’s resources in exchange for money to use to protect Supremum-17. Once the asteroid onslaught is defeated, maybe then Astronaut 64 and their dear cat, Prudence, can live in peace.

Objective:

Defend the planet from the incoming asteroids until your refineries finish mining the stellar dust!

Controls:

 to walk left or right

Scroll to zoom in and out.

 to jump

Hold to run 

to continue dialogue

 to interact with buildings or pick up objects/drop objects

 to enter throwing mode while holding an object

while in throwing mode to adjust the trajectory

again while in throwing mode to throw the object

How to play:

At the beginning of the game, scrap will fall from the sky. 

So will asteroids! 

 

Pick up (E key) and throw (F or E key) that scrap into factories on Supremum-17.

You can use that scrap to make towers boxes. 

Towers boxes can ONLY create towers by throwing (F key) or with the launcher

To use the launcher, place the Tower Box in side it (E key) then interact (E key) with the launcher

Build Refineries for 20 scraps to speed up your mining. 

Build Launcher towers for 5 scraps to throw towers more accurately. 

Build Laser towers for 15 scraps to destroy asteroids. 

Build Shield towers for 15 scraps to project a shield to protect from asteroids 

Build Collectors for 10 scraps to collect scrap to transport to the factory

Launch other tower boxes at the placed tower to upgrade them with a smaller effect of the thrown box. They can be upgraded up to THREE times.

Place your laser towers strategically to defend your planet from the asteroids until the mining operation is completed!
